Detailed Description

This file is the main file of the Test Module Controller.

Version:
0.1

Function Documentation

int main ( int  argc,
char *  argv[],
char *  envp[] 
)

Entry point of TMC

Parameters:
argc [in] number of the program arguments.
argv [in] address of the array that contains program arguments.
envp [in] environmental variables.
Returns:
exit code.
Format of programm arguments:
  • name of the application
  • path to the test library
  • list of config files for that module

Variable Documentation

TMC_t* ptmc

Adress of the TMC structure. Introduced to give access to the TMC structure in signal handlers.
